com.googlecode.xtweet

Interface Requester

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpConnectionRequester, HttpURLConnectionRequester, SocketConnectionRequester, SocketRequester

    public interface Requester
    Interface for requesting resource.
    Author:
    Jin Kwon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream request(String method, String url, String parameters, String authorization)
      Requests with given arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • request

        InputStream request(String method,
                  String url,
                  String parameters,
                  String authorization)
                    throws IOException,
                           TXCException
        Requests with given arguments.
        Parameters:
        method - request method
        url - request URL
        parameters - parameters (already URL-Encoded)
        authorization - authorization header value or null.
        Returns:
        resource stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        TXCException - if any error occurs
